Skip Navigation. Hit enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: Is Coaching For Me?: An Introduction to Step UP
Is Coaching For Me?: An Introduction to Step UP
Step Up Coach: What Does It Take?
What do you think you need to be a Coach? Select all that apply.
You Support students;Step Up supports you
What can an HCC student expect from the Step UP program?
Do You Have What It Takes?

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="The Step UP program is voluntary. Both coaches and students are volunteering to participate in the program. Without coaches the program simply would not exist. That is why your participation is so important. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Now that we’ve shared a little about coaching, what do you think you need to be a coach? Select all that apply." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Now that you have a better understanding on what coaching is, what do you think an HCC student can expect from the Step UP program?" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Are you ready to show students they matter?
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="If so, please contact the Director of Step UP to sign up at stepup@howardcc.edu or call 443-518-4465." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
